title: Kirchhoff loop - battery and identical R1 R2 R3 R4

content.question: Four identical resistors are connected to a battery, as shown in the figure. Which of the following claims must be correct? Take all stated potential differences to be positive quantities.

choices.label: The battery <math alttext="e m f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>emf</mi></math> is the same as the potential difference across <math alttext="R sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>.

The battery <math alttext="e m f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>emf</mi></math> is the sum of the potential differences across <math alttext="R sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="R sub 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>.

The potential differences across <math alttext="R sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="R sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> are the same.

The potential difference across <math alttext="R sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> is the sum of the potential differences across <math alttext="R sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="R sub 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>.

content.answer: The potential difference across <math alttext="R sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> is the sum of the potential differences across <math alttext="R sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="R sub 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
